word_mean: 增力，增强，加强：力量或强度增加。行为科学中，指给予一种在反应发生前即可使之增强的刺激

sentence.Network_cn: 所有的门上都有钢筋条加固。

sentence.Network_en: What the teacher now has to do is remove the reinforcement for this bad behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在老师要做的是避免这种不良行为更加严重。

sentence.Network_en: I am sure that this meeting will contribute to the reinforcement of peace and security all over the world.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信这次会议将会促进世界范围内的和平与安全。

entry.def: Reinforcements are soldiers or policemen who are sent to join an army or group of police in order to make it stronger.

example.ex: ...the despatch of police and troop reinforcements.

entry.def: The reinforcement of something is the process of making it stronger.

example.ex: I am sure that this meeting will contribute to the reinforcement of peace and security all over the world...
example.tran: 我相信这次会议将会促进世界范围内的和平与安全。

example.ex: What the teacher now has to do is remove the reinforcement for this bad behaviour...
example.tran: 现在老师要做的是避免这种不良行为更加严重。

means.word_mean: 1. a military operation (often involving new supplies of men and materiel) to strengthen a military force or aid in the performance of its mission;
2. information that makes more forcible or convincing;

sentences.sentence: "his gestures provided eloquent reinforcement for his complaints"

means.word_mean: 3. (psychology) a stimulus that strengthens or weakens the behavior that produced it
4. a device designed to provide additional strength;

sentences.sentence: "the cardboard backing was just a strengthener"
"he used gummed reinforcements to hold the page in his notebook"

means.word_mean: 5. an act performed to strengthen approved behavior

auth_sentence.content: The fibers being reinforcement for sintered ceramic like matrices.

auth_sentence.content: This, folks, is called positive reinforcement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This, folks, is called positive reinforcement.

auth_sentence.content: That kind of behavior will receive negative reinforcement.
auth_sentence.res_content: That kind of behavior will receive negative reinforcement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That kind of behavior will receive negative reinforcement.

Sentence.sentence: Reinforcement occurs when we receive direct or indirect rewards or punishments for particular gender role behaviors.
Children also learn gender roles through indirect reinforcement
Social learning theories also don't explain why reinforcement and modeling work for some children but not others, especially those in the same family and even identical twins.

sentences.en: Our troops consolidated our position with reinforcements.
sentences.cn: 增援部队的到来巩固了我军的阵地。

sentences.en: Send for reinforcements—the enemy are attacking in strength.
sentences.cn: 请派援军来——敌人加强进攻了。
